Articles.Content:
Hey guys, Dan here. I built an Eeloo capable ship like the one from "Europa Report", now all I need is a lander like from the movie. I have never landed on Eeloo before so I don't know what the lander should be like. Note it needs to have normal and correct RCS placement for docking and must have at least 4 engines and a docking port underneath.

When someone builds this lander, I will post pics of the mission!

Good luck!

Edited July 31, 2013 by iDan122
Anyone? Please? I'll construct something for you!
